content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal thoughts or opinions, but I can tell you that the success of Bayer's efforts to address these challenges will depend on factors such as the effectiveness of its R&D initiatives, the adoption of its pricing models, its ability to comply with regulatory standards, its diversification efforts and the effectiveness of its risk management practices. By implementing these strategies, Bayer is positioning itself to remain competitive and successful in the pharmaceutical industry.
